Configuring Project Databases and Projects

You can define how you want Serena ChangeMan Version Manager to operate if the default way the product operates does not suit your needs. You can configure Version Manager to operate:

  • The same for all project databases by embedding a configuration file into Version Manager.
  • The same for all projects of a project database by configuring only the configuration file associated with the project database.
  • Differently for some projects of a project database. For example, you can define a promotion model for some projects and not for others.

To configure project databases and projects, you set configuration options in configuration files.

See Also

Setting Configuration Options
